https://x.com/MakeSunsets
https://www.linkedin.com/company/make-sunsets/

Make Sunsets is selling their services of filling high altitude (hydrogen) balloons with SO2 (sulfur dioxide) with approximately 1700 grams of SO2 (per balloon) in order to release them above 66,000 feet.

I have already filed reports with the California EPA & Federal EPA

The gas station owner took it upon himself to buy fuel in 55-gallon poly drums and drop fuel from the drums into the Underground Storage Tanks (USTs) at his gas station. This caused the emission of vapors into the environment.  Pictures were provided.

However, one of the trash bags used to dispose of the insulation has broken open, and loose material, possibly fiberglass insulation, is now being carried by the wind into the street and nearby public areas.

This debris is accumulating on sidewalks and around homes. Please investigate and ensure the area is properly cleaned and any remaining materials are removed.
